Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Phira asim usa nu ika maidana vica pa dita ate uha nidala si
Ate asim usa ute ika velam vala darakhata uga dita
Ate asim usa nu ika lakha jam usa tom vi zi'ada lokam vala bheji'a
Phira uha loka imana li'a'e tam asim unham nu nisacita samem taka labha utha'una dita
Tam unham nu puchom ki tuhade raba la'i beti'am hana ate unham la'i putara
Ki asim farisati'am nu aurata bana'i'a hai ate uha dekha rahe sana
Suna lavo iha loka sirafa managharata rupa vica ajiha kahide hana
Ki alaha aulada rakhada hai yakinana hi' iha jhuthe hana
Ki alaha ne beti'am di tulana vica beti'am pasada kiti'am hana
Tuhanu ki ho gi'a hai`tusim kiho jiha faisala karade ho
Phira ki tusim budhi tom kama nahim lainde
Ki tuhade pasa ko'i sapasata dalila hai
Jekara tusim sace ho tam apani kitaba li'a'u
Ate unham ne alaha ate jinam vica vi risatedari jora rakhi hai. Ate jinam nu pata hai ki yakinana uha phare ho'e a'unnage
Alaha unham galam tom pavitara hai jihari'am iha bi'ana karade hana
Paratu uha jihare alaha de cune ho'e bade hana
So tusim ate jinham di tusim puja karade ho
Alaha tom kise nu mora nahim sakade
Para usa nu jihara naraka vica jana vala hai
Ate sade vicom hareka da ika mithi'a ho'i'a sathana hai
Ate asim alaha de sahamane pagatam vica kharhe rahina vale ham
Ate asim usa di sifata salaha karana vale ham
Ate iha loka kiha karade sana
Ki je sade kola pahilam vale lokam di ko'i sikhi'a hudi
Tam asim vi alaha de visesa bade hude
Phira unham ne usa nu jhuthala dita tam jaladi hi uha samajha lainage
Ate apane bheje ho'e badi'am la'i sada iha nirana pahilam hi ho cuki'a hai
Ki besaka uha hi prabhavasali honage
Ate sadi'am phaujam hi jitana vali'am hana
Tam kujha samem taka unham tom muha moro
Ate dekhade raho jaladi hi uha vi dekha lainage
Ki uha sadi saza la'i jaladi kara rahe hana
Phira jadom uha unham de maidana vica a javega tam unham lokam di savera bari mari hovegi' jinham nu usa tom dara'i'a ja cuki'a hai
Tam kujha samem la'i unham tom muha mori rakho
Ate dekhade raho jaladi hi' uha khuda vi dekha lainage
Tera raba satikarayoga hai ate unham galam tom pavitara hai jihare iha loka bi'ana karade hana
Ate paigabaram nu salama hai
Ate sari prasasa alaha la'i hai jihara sapurana sasara da palanahara hai
Sada., Sahu hai upadesa vale kura'ana di
Sagom jinham lokam ne inakara kita uha hathadharami ate hakara vica hana
Isa tom pahilam asim kini'am hi kaumam barabada kara diti'am tam uha pukarana lage ate uha samam bacana da nahim si
Ate unham lokam ne hairani pragata kiti ki unham de kola unham vicom ika dara'una vala a'i'a hai. Ate jhuthala'una vali'am ne kiha ki iha jadugara hai ate jhutha hai
Ki usa ne ine pujanayogam di tham ika pujanayoga bana dita. Iha tam bari anokhi gala hai
Ate unham de saradara utha ke kharhe ho ga'e ki calo ate apane pujanayogam upara jame raho. Iha ko'i matalaba di gala hai
Asim iha gala pichale dharama vica nahim suni. Iha sirafa ika ghari ho'i gala hai
Ki sade sari'am vicom isa bade te hi alaha di bani utari ga'i hai, sagom iha loka mere valom kiti nasihata te saka karade hana. Sagom unham ne huna taka meri saza da savada nahim cakhi'a
Ki tere raba di_rahimata de bhadara unham de kola hana jihara takatavara ate kirapalu hai
Ki akasam, dharati ate unham de vicakara zizam di malaki unham de adhikara vica hai, phira uha pauri'am laga ke carha jana
Ika phauja iha vi ike barabada hovegi sari'am phaujam vicom
Inham tom pahilam nuha di kauma, ada ate mekham vala fira'auna
Firaaaina samuva, luta di kauma ate eka vali'am ne inakara kita. Iha loka vade-vade samuha sana
Unham sari'am ne sulam nu jhuthala'i'a tam meri saza pahuca ke rahi
Ate iha loka sirafa ika caghi'ara di udika vica hana jisa tom ba'ada ko'i dhila nahim
Ate unham ne kiha ki he sade raba! Sada hisa sanu hisaba de dina tom pahilam de ve
Jo kujha uha kahide hana usa ute dhiraja rakho ate sade bade da'uda nu yada karo. Jihara samaratha vala hai ate (apane raba vala) jhukana vala si
Asim paharam nu usa de nala hi vasa vica kara dita ki uha usa de nala hi' savere sama (alaha di) siphata salaha karade sana
Ate pachi'am de jhuda vi alaha hi sifata salaha karana vale sana
Ate asim usa di sata nu sathira kara dita ate usa nu bibeka pradana kita ate mamali'am da phaisala karana di yogata pradana kiti
